name: Pandawa Hill Resort
address: Jl. Pantai Pandawa No.15, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Our recent stay at the property was quite disappointing. While the staff were friendly and the hot water was consistent, the overall experience left much to be desired. The location was not ideal, making it difficult to access the airport and explore the surrounding area on foot. The cleanliness of the property was subpar, which was a major drawback for us. The room and refrigerator smelt really bad of mould, and has flared health issues for both me and my partner.

We tried to move rooms but were informed the hotel was fully booked. They offered to clean the air conditioner but instead only masked the smell with a coffee treatment.

Additionally, the facilities were lacking, with limited amenities available. Overall, we did not feel that the value for money matched our expectations.

We would not recommend this property for those seeking a comfortable and convenient stay. It is seriously run down and not even worth it - stay somewhere else!
review 2: Great hotel! Amazing spot for the price. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The food was great. If you like smoothies, those were amazing as well. They also have a small fitness center on site which I enjoyed!
review 3: Rooms are a nice size clean and comfortable. Only complaint is the shower is over a bath and it's difficult to keep water from going onto the floor. Service at reception is very good. Service in the restaurant is very bad, especially Ayu. On arrival she hands you a menu to take to your table. After ordering and receiving food she doesn't return to the table and when I needed a napkin I had to go to the front desk to ask. I was then informed that there are napkins on the next table.
review 4:
Here is our story. We booked for 1 month, payed filly and manager gave us a big discount, but with term that refund is impossible.
However, we stayed only 11 days, received cleaning service only once, and we had an urgent matter to move out.

Minuses:
- A/C has a mold on the wall
- A/C smells like public toilets: called master twice, problem was not solved
- not sure what was the bike party, but for few days we have heard crazy loud roar of the engines and horns.
- bathtub surrounded with tons of mold
- in the bathroom, somewhere under the bathtub colony of insects (not sure who they were: ants with wings)

During moving out I kindly ask to return at least something, because we have been in the hotel less than half of a month! Request was declined.
Manager suggested price per night 600000rp, even though refund has not been completed.

We didn‚Äôt have much time to argue, our bad, we didn‚Äôt pay much attention to terms and services.

From pluses:
- amazing restaurant, food is so delicious

However, I would prefer rent a villa with private pool with this money than to stay in that old place
review 5: Very big rooms, compared to that the bathroom was small. Service is slightly slow, but it's alright.  Worth the money spent. Good option for stay.

name: Warung Local Price
address: Jl. Raya Nusa Dua Selatan No.22, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
A very reasonable place to dine in Ungasan. Located nearby the Pandawa beach. Just a simple warung but the food is excellent. This place is very famous among foreign tourists in Ungasan. Good portion, excellent taste, reasonable price. Take away food is available too.
Side road parking available.
review 2: Good food, less crowded and quick delivery, run by a family, reasonable price. Located on a wide road with less traffic.
review 3: For local food experience, this is recommended. They speak English, so its easy to request for diced chilly padi. If I had to nitpick, my noodle was on the oilier side. If not, the noodle was al dente and tasty, which is to my liking. A grocer is just around the corner, which is a plus point for me
review 4: Best food in Bali! We came here 3 days in a row twice a day. Lovely owners, nice portions and local prices:)
review 5: We ate at many restaurants and warungs during our 3 week stay in Bali. Without doubt, I think it's one of the best places where you can enjoy fantastic local price at such a low price. Delicious, big size portions of anything traditional you can imagine finding in Bali. A place always packed with both locals and tourists looking to enjoy a great meal. The food was so good we stopped here 3 times during our 4 day stay in Pandawa. Totally recommend!

name: D'pandawa Guest House
address: Jl. Raya Nusa Dua Selatan No.16, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Got to stay here lastminute and even got a discount because there was no hot shower. Really nice room, clean and comfortable bed! Also shared kitchen available. Host is really really nice aswell and the kittens and dog are a extra bonus ;). 100% recommend!
review 2: The upper rooms are very large and spacious with air conditioning and hot water.  The price is cheap!  Small kitchen that you can share with other guests!  Wayan is fantastic!  Always available to help you!
review 3: Cheap clean quiet!  Close to surf spots Green bowl and Pandawa right.
review 4: Affordable price,nice view and so close to pandawa beach

name: Mulia Home stay
address: Jl. Gunung Payung No.9X, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
We had a great time staying here for a few nights.

Originally we only booked for three nights to explore Nusa Dua but the owners were very nice and the room was great too so we extended our stay.

The room was clean and had everything we needed and we felt very welcome here. The owner also provided us tea in the morning which was very nice and some bottles of water which were much neede in Bali heat.

The location is good but you should get a scooter.
We ended up renting one each from Sari Mulia (the owners family member's business) for reasonable price and then we travelled everywhere from Uluwatu and Padang Padang all the way to Nusa Dua and Kuta.

For nearby food, Warung Local Price was great so you will not go hungry if you do not want to cook.

The only negative consideration is the amount of dogs present in the streets and gardens around. Some were quite aggressive and one street dog had foam around its mouth.

This is definitely a place we will come back to when we are in the area.
review 2: Stayed here for a week in Dec 21-28 for our year end vacation cum honeymoon. Very helpful and patient couple. Their breakfasts are yummy, both the western and Balinese. As an Indian I loved both. Price is also reasonable for cottage stay. You need bike to go around though as it's usually hot to walk outside and beaches are minimum 2 KM away. Groceries are also around 300 metre distance
review 3: This is Wonderful place to stay in Bali and one of our favourites. We spent one week in the suite with a kitchen. Pandawa beach is within driving distance, as are shops and restaurants. And the hosts are warm and accommodating. Would not hesitate to book again. Highly Recommended
review 4:
If you booked a room there you found a gem. Perfect little getaway in the south, with the nicest hosts ever. The food they prepare is delicious and the rooms are nice and clean. With a scooter or car you can reach every beach/attraction in no time.
I would definitely book there again.
review 5: Fantastic place to stay, Mulia & Made are the nicest hosts you will ever meet, lovely quiet beautiful place to stay, food is fantastic. You can rent scooters direct or have Made drive you to places. This is the nicest place I have stayed in Indonesia

name: Patia Coffee
address: Jl. Raya Nusa Dua Selatan Jl. Alas Arum, Pandawa, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80363, Indonesia
review 1:
Excellent coffee - probably the best we‚Äôve had since we‚Äôve been in Bali (3 weeks).

Food was unusual but really tasty & the staff were super friendly.
review 2: A real gem, the staff, the atmosphere, coffee, food and music create this great vibe that makes you wanna come back. Absolutely loved it ü´∂
review 3: This cafe is just a gem of Nusa Dua. The atmosphere of the early nineties in the interior is cool looking. The coffee is of the highest quality! The foam in the latte is very thick and does not fall off for a long time. From the food I tried the tuna sandwich which is a simple and tasty dish. I enjoyed my time here üôè
review 4: Very nice coffee. And great food. The cafe is very comfortable with perfect ac and also 2 outdoor places to sit. And not so crowded. Very friendly owner and he can talk coffee endlessly. Must try if you are this side
review 5: A nice place with big meal portions and good prices. Waiter speaks good english. Healthy cooked with not much oil. üëç

name: Kos Maven
address: Jl. Raya Nusa Dua Selatan, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

name: Warung Makan Sunda Ibu Heri
address: Jl. Raya Nusa Dua Selatan, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: We stopped by here a few times and we love it! The lady was super nice, but do not speak English. We understood her using body language! You get to pick and choice you own food and the amount that you want on your plat. The lady will calculate and show you the price on a calculator. The food is on the spicier side, but it was really good and cheap! Highly recommended!
review 2: The food tastes authentic and delicious. Lots of choices. Price is very reasonable.
review 3:
I love the food here üòç, I always load up a big portion of food !
Cheap and really great tasting ü§§
review 4:
1. A lot of food choices.
2. The staff is nice.
3. Nice food.
4. Nice service.
review 5: I had from everything. From fish(small and big ones) to chicken,veggies, potatoes... and to be honest its not more that 2*. The best part was the Avocado juice which was tasteless! I have no clue why ppl give it 4* ?!!! The thing is the indo foods is nothing compare to thai's.dont get me wrong there are some good restaurants here and have decent food. Ive been in bali for a month and traveled all over. The only thing is missing here is a good tasteful dishes.

name: SRC D & D Mart - D & D Room
address: Jl. Raya Nusa Dua Selatan, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

name: Bali Villa | The Wyn Villa
address: Jl. Gapura Vista No.5, Pandawa, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
By far, I think this villa is the best villa that I‚Äôve ever sleep in, in Bali. This villa has a beautiful surrounding (nature). So if you are a nature or a plant lovers, you will definitely enjoy staying in here. When you first walk in to the villa there‚Äôs a big stone that says its name ‚ÄúThe Wyn Villa‚Äù. And then if you go further in the inside, you can see several door entrance to each villa that you‚Äôre going to stay in. The door entrance is very beautifully sculptured like an entrance to a historical places, even though it is rather small.
Now after you go through that door entrance you can immediately see the private pool inside the villa beside you. On my experience, the one that I‚Äôve stayed in, it was in my left side, and on the right side you can see a mini gazebo for you to relax in. After that if you go in to the building of the villa, there‚Äôs a nice living room with a TV and a few sofa, and next to that there‚Äôs 2 large bed with a curtain on each side, so that you can close it whenever you want when you need a privacy. And not to forget, the bathroom is so large, there‚Äôs a lot of empty spaces in there.
The service of this villa is quite nice, they will prepare your breakfast in the morning and deliver it to your resident, and after we‚Äôre done they will take it all back by themselves so that you don‚Äôt have to go outside your resident. I very highly recommend this villa if you guys ever want to stay in Uluwatu Bali. This place is very zen and you guys can use the pool freely without having to share with other people that you don‚Äôt know. And lastly this place is close to a beach near that place, so if you want to go to a beach you can easily find one near it.
review 2: Absolutely beautiful villa, the private pool was to die for üëåüèª and the room was spacious and clean. The staff are SO helpful, from organising breakfast to organising taxis and all with a friendly smile. Highly recommend this villa for anyone wanting to stay in the area and is only a short taxi ride away from Kuta and the surf beaches. Five stars!
review 3: My family and I loved staying here. After a big 3 week holiday, the peaceful environment was perfect to relax and enjoy our last 5 days in Bali. Gita and employees are amazing, and strive to make your stay comfortable. Nothing is too much trouble. The area is part of the developing side of the Bukit peninsula, but we're lucky to stay within the villages. As progress goes, it won't last. Thanks again Gita and all of the fabulous staff, you've made my birthday perfect!
review 4:
Located in south part of bali, Kuta.
Very good location and near to the pandawa beach. Staff is very very friendly and responsive. They provide quite good breakfast with room delivery.

We have got a 1 bedroom pool villa for Rs.2800 per night. And its a big villa. Quite spacious. Pool is neatly maintained. Its just worth more than the money they charge. They have a paid laundry service which is very cheap compared to any other place in bali.
They provided a complimentery cake on our anniversay with a flower boquet üòçüíê Felt really special with their service.
review 5: Very nice stay at the wynvilla.. villa is beautiful, private pool is cleaned, hot, and the size is perfect for two! Breakfast is really good ! We spent a wonderful time et wynvilla and would definitely like to come back! Thank you to all of the nice staff !!!!

name: RUMAH KOST MADE
address: 55CJ+JVM, Jl. Gunung Payung, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Nice place. With view garden and cozy

name: Tanah Belus Homestay
address: Jl. Gapura Vista No.9, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

name: warung muslim jawa banyuwangi
address: Jl. Melasti I No.ll, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: If you stay near Pandawa & don't know what to eat, I recommend you to eat at this warung... They sell Indonesian food with affordable price & home cooking style...  Have options for vegan too like tofu, tempeh & veggies, you can choose food in the buffet as you please...

name: Kubu Celagimanis
address: 557P+P72, Kutuh, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Hlloo guys come to see the place

address: Jl. Melasti II No.88, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

name: D'JAJANG ,guest House
address: 558P+HR3, Kutuh, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali, Indonesia

name: Warung Turis
address: 557J+M3C, Jl. Alas Arum, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: I‚Äôm in love with this place. Chef Wayan and his lovely wife made the best BBQ ribs I ever tried and both are absolutely fantastic. When I comeback to Bali I‚Äôll definitely bring my family and my friends to Warung Turis!!!
review 2: for breakfast Nasi goreng is great !! you should taste there , such a nice owner  and taste. fresh juices are good also.
review 3:
Good family home cooked meal vibes. Dad had the ribs and we come from the south in the states so we know bbq and this was good.

Mom had capcay which is off menu and it was really tasty. Like a home cooked meal. I eat lots of capcay and this one was top ranking.

I had the Funghi pizza and it was nice. Crust was decent and the cheese had a good flavor for bali pizza.

Fast service, friendly owner and good price.
review 4:
I really enjoyed my time in Warung Turis. As a vegan I was a bit worried about find some vegan food which is close to place that I stay. I ordered spaghetti aglio aolio which was delicious.

The owner lady is so lovely, they have place to park the bikes, they have super cute cats and the atmosphere of the restaurant is also so nice. Will back again for sure! ‚ú®Ô∏è
review 5: The shop owner is super friendly and yummy food - both Indonesian and Western dishes. We had ayam panggang and pizza. There are also dogs and cat if you like them. They also offer cooking class at the beach.

name: Pure Bar
address: Jl. Melasti II Jl. Nusa Dua No.88, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

name: WARUNG KUDESA
address: 558P+VG4, Jl. Raya Nusa Dua Selatan, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Ok, food but very small portions!  They will try to trick you to pay a lot of money! They don‚Äôt like foreigners! I would recommend to go to the place just across the street instead.
review 2: Very good food! Only local people eating there but we recommend tourists to try the traditional food out!
review 3: Very authentic Balinese food. Freshly made. The fish is delicious.
review 4: DO NOT EAT HERE! We got FOOD POISONING after eating there!

name: Waroeng kampoeng
address: 557H+WXQ, Jl. Melasti II, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Randomly decided to try this place walking by, and it‚Äôs the best food I‚Äôve had in Bali in my 3 weeks here so far.

Staff is lovely too.

Mine gorang, gato gato, and a lamb curry dish.
review 2: Friendly personnel but expensive food with small portions. Felt humiliated when got chicken without meat, just bones and skin
